main event: A witness observed one white light and a reddish-white light in the sky, which appeared to be connected.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 20 minutes., The lights were seen over the Monsanto and Golf Course area., Initial sighting included one light before visualizing two connected lights., No physical evidence of the sighting was found., The Air Force requested additional data from the witness via AF Form 117.
sighted object: one white light and a reddish-white light
